common.healthcareExperts: Our healthcare experts are here to help you
common.chooseScheduling: Choose from priority or normal scheduling options.
common.priorityDescription: We understand the urgency. Cancer patients receive priority scheduling, fastest turnaround time, and dedicated support from our team.
common.normalScheduleDescription: Schedule your tests at your convenience. Choose from available time slots and get your results within standard turnaround times.
common.healthConcerns: Health concerns? Talk to a specialist!
common.doctorDescription: Book appointments with experienced doctors for personalized health advice
common.dieticianDescription: Get personalized nutrition plans from certified dieticians
common.emergencyContact: NEED IMMEDIATE HELP IN AN EMERGENCY, PLEASE CONTACT THE NUMBERS BELOW.
common.emergencyDescription: In case of a disaster in your area, please contact the relevant number immediately. All citizens should save these numbers and use them if needed.
common.womenWellnessDescription: Because early awareness and timely care can protect your health and give you confidence for a better tomorrow.
common.happinessDescription: Nurture your well-being with daily reflections, mindfulness practices, positive affirmations, and meditation music.
common.connectedQuestion: How connected did you feel with others today? (1-10)
common.physicalHealthQuestion: Did you take care of your physical health today?
common.meaningfulActivityQuestion: Did you engage in meaningful activities today?
common.gratitudeQuestion: What are you grateful for today?
common.mindfulnessIntro: Take a moment to breathe deeply and center yourself. Mindfulness practices can help reduce stress, improve emotional well-being, and promote healing.
common.healingIntro: Healing is a journey, not a destination. Practice self-compassion and be patient with yourself as you navigate through challenges.
common.wellnessIntro: Remember that every small step towards wellness matters. Your mental and emotional health is just as important as your physical health.
common.meditationMusicDescription: Take a moment to relax and find your inner peace with these calming meditation music videos.
common.familyHealthCardBenefit3: 10+ Services Free Of Cost & Discounted Price
common.healthCardDescription: Get exclusive benefits with our health card program:
common.discountOnTests: Up to 20% discount on all tests
common.startAddingFavorites: Start adding care packages to your favorites to see them here
common.aboutDescription1: At MY SWANAND Pathology Laboratory, we are dedicated to delivering accurate, reliable, and timely diagnostic services that form the foundation of better healthcare decisions.
common.aboutDescription2: Pathology is the science of understanding diseases — and it plays a vital role in modern medicine. At MY SWANAND, we combine advanced technology, scientific expertise, and a compassionate approach to ensure every patient receives the best care possible.
common.aboutDescription3: We simplify complex medical data, making every report easy to understand and patient-friendly.
common.service1: Comprehensive health check-up packages for all age groups.
common.visionDescription: We aspire to redefine healthcare through precision, innovation, and compassion — ensuring that every interaction, from diagnosis to care, becomes a transformative experience that improves lives.
common.missionDescription: Our heartfelt mission for the coming years (till the end of 2027) is to amplify our diagnostic impact, aiming to conduct precise and timely tests for over 30,000 patients annually, thereby enhancing the overall well-being of the community.
common.journey2015Desc: Started with a vision to make healthcare accessible
common.journey2017Desc: Added home collection and digital reports
common.aboutVisionDescription: We are here to support healthcare in transforming healthcare, innovatively from traditional diagnostic testing to advanced Molecular tools, from village lab to some smart clinic, focusing on clear experience in easy steps.
common.aboutMissionDescription: Our heartfelt motive for the coming years 10, the year of 2035 is to notify our diagnostic services offering personal service and friendly testing for every potential person who may need any wellness services prior to our wish mainly in the community.
common.journey2020Desc: Started our journey with a vision to provide quality diagnostic services to the community.
common.journey2021_2022Desc: Firmly stood helping the community during the pandemic with dedication and commitment.
common.journey2023Desc: Continued gaining trust of patients through sincerity, team work and utmost dedication.
common.journey2024Desc: Launched Swanand Healthcard delivering holistic well being and not just discounts on blood tests.
common.journey2025Desc: Work on MySwanand App in progress to bring healthcare services to your fingertips.
common.journey2026Desc: Ready to deliver MySwanand App with personalized accurate healthcare. Becomes a referral lab with all pathology services under one roof.
common.founderDesc1: Dr. Poorva Rane Surve is the visionary founder of Swanand Pathology Laboratory. With a passion for accurate diagnostics and patient care, she established Swanand with the mission to provide reliable, affordable, and accessible healthcare services to the community.
common.founderDesc2: With her extensive experience in pathology and commitment to excellence, Dr. Rane has built Swanand into a trusted name in diagnostic services. Her dedication to innovation led to the development of the Swanand Healthcard and the upcoming MySwanand App, bringing modern healthcare solutions to patients.
common.founderDesc3: Under her leadership, Swanand continues to grow as a comprehensive referral laboratory, offering a wide range of pathology services while maintaining the highest standards of quality and patient satisfaction.
common.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

common.failedToSendReset: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.

common.registrationSuccessful: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account. Redirecting to login...
common.invalidMobile: Please enter a valid 10-digit mobile number
common.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
common.agreeTermsRequired: You must agree to the terms & policy
common.contactIntro1: We're here to help you! Whether you have questions about our pathology services, booking a test, or need assistance with your report, our team is always ready to support you.
common.contactIntro2: At MY SWANAND, we believe in providing quick, reliable, and patient-friendly communication. Feel free to reach out to us — we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
common.agreePrivacy: I agree to the privacy policy and consent to be contacted.
common.privacyIntro1: At Swanand Pathology ("Swanand", "we", "our", "us"), we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the confidentiality of your personal and health information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your data when you use our website, mobile application, and related services (collectively, the "Platform").
common.privacyIntro2: By accessing or using our Platform, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
common.termsIntro1: Welcome to Swanand Pathology ("Swanand", "we", "our", "us"). These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website, mobile application, and related services (collectively, the "Platform").
common.termsIntro2: By accessing, registering, or using the Platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our Platform.
common.refundIntro1: At Swanand Pathology, we strive to deliver high-quality diagnostic and healthcare services. This Return, Cancellation & Refund Policy explains how cancellations, returns, and refunds are handled for services booked through our website or mobile application.
common.refundIntro2: Due to the nature of medical and diagnostic services, returns and refunds are subject to specific conditions as explained below.
